1211211111.content:
Into your room walks a beautiful woman, maybe in her late 20s or early 30s, in a tailored suit with a short skirt, high heels, and a V-neck shirt that shows off her cleavage.

You’re taken aback, but she quickly says, “It’s me -- your mother.” She’s carrying a laptop, the screen open, and she puts it down on your desk.

“You changed too?!” you exclaim.

“I changed myself late last night, and then I changed you and your sister,” she explains.

“What?! How?!”

She waved toward the computer, and you see a 3D model of a woman rotating slowly on the screen. You then realize that that’s your body.

“What is that, some kind of magic program?!”

She says, “I guess so. I got an email about this morphing software -- it said they were sending it to people at random, something about an ‘alpha test.’ I thought it was for photos, but then I turned myself into this -- I look like Ivanka Trump.”

“Okay, whatever,” you say. “You look great, I can understand that, but why would you turn me into a girl?!”

“Aw, I was just having fun,” she says. “I turned your sister into a lingerie model.”

“What?! Mom, Carly is 12!”

“Not anymore! She’s 18, and she’s off at a photo shoot today,” your altered mother explains. “This program doesn’t just morph your body, it can morph your mind, or your life -- it even has options objects and species. Here, let me demonstrate -- I made you beautiful, so you shouldn’t be covering up with those baggy clothes.”

“Wait, what do you mean?” you ask, but your mother doesn’t answer; she just turns toward the laptop and types something in. You see the word “skimpy,” but the text disappears when she hits “Enter”.

You feel as if your clothes are crawling across your body. You look down to see that your sweatpants and sweatshirt are shrinking, their material altering; within seconds, you’re in a black leather miniskirt and a white halter top that’s straining a bit to contain your large breasts.

“Hmm,” says your mother, looking at you, “just one more thing.” She quickly types something else, and you feel yourself going up onto tiptoes. You realize you’ve gone from barefoot to wearing high-heeled shoes.

“Okay, so I guess the ‘object’ morphs are working” you say, still looking down into your cleavage.

“Oh no, I did a life morph” your mother tells you. “I changed it so you always wear skimpy clothes and high heels.”

“Mom!”

“What? I did the high-heels thing to myself and your sister this morning,” she says, raising one foot slightly to show off the shoes you already noticed. “I’ve never been so comfortable in them.”

“All right, Mom, listen to me,” you say. “You’ve had your fun with me, but, please, turn me back into my male self so I can go to school.”

Your mother smiles and says...

12112111111.content:
Your mother smiles and says, 'No reason why you can't go to school like that! I did your life morph so everyone but our family thinks you've always been a girl...Marcie.'

You cringe a bit at the girl's name. 'I've got a reason -- these clothes,' you say, indicating the skimpy outfit and high heels that your mother just put you in. 'This definitely isn't okay with the dress code.'

Your mother looks a bit surprised. 'Oh, you might be right,' she admits. 'But let's see what I can do.' She turns to the laptop, and you look over her shoulder as she goes through the menus.

'Okay, I think it'll work with just another life morph,' she says, selecting that option. It brings up only a text entry box, which she starts typing into. 'Let's see, I'll just say that part of your life is that your high school lets girls wear skimpy outfits, and -- hey, I should make you a cheerleader while I'm at it.'

'What?! No!' you protest, but you see her jab the Enter key.

You know there's a football game tonight and a pep rally at the end of the day, which means the cheerleaders would be wearing their uniforms to school today. Therefore, you're not surprised to look down and see your clothes altering once again, into a black-and-gold cheerleader's uniform. However, instead of consisting of a long-sleeve sweater and skirt that's nearly knee-length, the outfit that appears on you is a halter top -- even skimpier than what you were wearing seconds ago -- and a 'skirt' that's really just a bikini bottom with a few small fabric panels attached. You're also wearing knee-high boots with what must be 4-inch heels.

'Oh, wow,' says your mother. You assume she's referring to your uniform, but you look up to see that she's looking down at her own clothes. It still vaguely resembles a woman's suit, but now the jacket is in a bolero style, the shirt is tight and midriff-baring, and the skirt is micro-length, only a few inches long. Her shoes, too, have changed, gaining platforms and even higher heels. 'But I didn't say anything about changing my clothes.'

You realize what happened. 'Mom, I think this program is even more powerful than you think. It's like -- for my school to let girls wear skimpy outfits, it meant other schools had to do the same thing, and they wouldn't do it unless it was more normal for girls -- women -- to dress like this!'

'Hmm,' she mutters as she feels the fabric of her tiny skirt. 'You might be right.'

'If high school cheerleaders dress like this, what do you think NFL cheerleaders wear?' you ask.

'You mean you're not enjoying this?' she retorts, with a bit of a smile on her face.

'I don't know!' you exclaim. 'I'm sure I might have as a boy, but now I'm a girl, and you probably did something to my mind --'

'Hey, I did not do a mind morph to you,' your mother interrupts. 'At least, not yet. Carly I did, but only to make sure she's thinking like an adult and can take care of herself.'

'But I just feel so -- so --' You have to sit down, on the edge of your bed. 'I'm overwhelmed.' Your lower lip starts to quiver. You can feel tears welling up. 'Oh, my God, this must be my girly hormones, right?'

'Oh, hey, hey, it's okay,' says your mother. She sits next to you and puts her arm around you. 'I promise, I'm going to change things back -- but I think you'll kick yourself later if you don't take the opportunity to spend a day as a girl.'

You chortle, managing to choke back a sob. 'You swear everyone thinks I'm a girl?'

'As far as I can tell,' your mother responds.

You sigh and stand up, and your mother does the same. 'Come on downstairs -- we'll have a little breakfast, and I'll drive you to school.'

'Okay,' you say, wiping your eyes, and then realizing you might have smeared your makeup. There's no smudges on your hands, though.

Your mother grins. 'Our makeup is permanent. I also made it so we don't have to shave.'

'Hmm, maybe you should see if you can do that for every woman.'

'Maybe I will,' she says. 'I guess I could do that with the 'species morph'? But for now, just one thing...'

1211211111111.content:
“Did we break the world” You thought to yourself. The bus ride over was very interesting to say the least. Watching all the women, young and old, go about their day in completely skimpy clothing was downright bizarre. Clothing that would have been considered club wear or worn only by “Women of the night” was apparently acceptable now. A quick gaggle search showed only modest clothing was worn by deeply religious or conservative people. And that ‘modest’ clothing is what would have been acceptable by normal standards only 12 hours ago.

Arriving early and totally weirded out, you found a quiet spot in the library. Apparently “Marcie” only listens to bubblegum pop music, though you narrowly avoid a meltdown by streaming some heavy metal music.

You check your schedule; still the same classes and professors. It really is like Marcie was just living your old life. You wonder how the everyone else in the school would see you, especially your fiends Jason and Eric-

“Um, excuse me” A voice said. You look up and see two girls in front of you, no one you recognize.

Umm…are you…uh…by chance…Marcie” one of them asked, nervous out of her mind.

“Uh....yeah! What’s...up?” You ask nervous yourself.

They both heave a huge sigh of relief and sit down.

“It’s… well… us Marcie, your old friends” One says.

“Uhh…I don’t follow” You say.

“We can’t say our old names, I go by Jennifer and she’s Elizabeth, but it’s, you know, us…. changed.”

The gears turn slowly in your head

“Your mom…the program?” The one called Jennifer said.

“Wait!....Jennifer! Elizabeth!” You had meant to say Jason and Eric.

“Yeah we can’t say our old names. It was my Mom’s idea.” Elizabeth said.

“Your Mom’s idea” You ask confused.

“So apparently when your Mom got the program last night she called our Mom’s and told them about it. They all got “upgrades”, new bodies, houses etc. And we woke up like this” Elizabeth explains waving to her body.

Eric, was probably the most athletic of your little token troop, maybe could’ve made the football team if he had the desire and shed 10 pounds or so. Elizabeth on the other hand was very slender and though she looked like she lost a few inches in height, she was still tall and leggy. She was built more like the average runway model. Her former dark skin seemed to have lightened a couple shades as well, her long hair in a loose ponytail. Her outfit consisted of a see-through top that proudly showed off her bra, and a tiny mini-skirt not dissimilar to yours.

Jason, now Jennifer had a much more dramatic transformation though. He used to be a pudgy Jewish guy no one paid much mind to, despite being the salutatorian of your grade. Jennifer was a petite redhead, her do in a chin length bob complete with bangs. All her fat had shifted, going to her curves and leaving a dramatic hourglass figure. Her mauve mini-dress had a key hole showing off her ample cleavage and was struggling to cover her rear end.

“Oh my god” You drop your face in your hands, spilling your hair them in the process. “What else has she done”

“We were kinda hoping you could tell us” Elizabeth said. “These are not the clothes I put on this morning”

You explain the fiasco of your Mom transforming you into a cheerleader and the clothing morph.

“So what’s her endgame” Jennifer asks.

“I don’t know. Something about needing to ‘spend the day as a girl’"

“That’s the same BS my mom said as well” Jennifer said.

“Look after the game tonight the three of us are going to confront her and fix this”

“How do you plan on cheerleading?” Elizabeth asked. You shot her a glaring look. “Okay, I don’t want to know”

“Just…one class at a time” You reluctantly say.

“Do the uniforms really have heels now?” Jennifer asks.

“It sucks, but at she made it so I’m comfortable in them.”

“How does that work?” Elizabeth asks.

"In the morph I only specified that you couldn't wear ponytails. I don't see why it shouldn't work." Mom explained.

You sitting were at your vanity, Mom behind you attempting to do something regarding your hair situation. After the awkwardness of discovering Carly's morphs, you took the initiative in hiding away the laptop and the tablet, away from your mother's, or worse, sisters hands. You strutted around the mansion, barely noticing your swaying hips, eventually finding your way into a furnished basement gasping as you entered. It was a full studio with tables and racks of all kinds unfinished clothes, bags, and other accessories.

"Wait, Carly's morph said something about us being... fashion designers or like that? You thought. This must be your families studio. You examined a weird dress hanging on mannequin. Strategic lace on top with only two panels of fabric reaching the floor, barely covering the front and rear. "I guess we don't have to buy haute couture, we create it. Where did that come from?" You thought again, wondering where that correct terminology came from. You did get an idea though. You looked around for the area with the skimpiest clothing. Sure enough you found an area with various half finished miniskirts, minidresses, cutoff tops, and even some tiny bikinis. You had to guess that this was your work space.

"Apparently we contribute to this messed up society" you muttered to no one in particular. Quickly thinking, you stashed the programs in a sparkly tote and hung it on a rack obscured by clothes. You figure they would be safe there, until you find a more permanent solution.

You reunited with your mother who wanted to do something about your hair dilemma.

"I got these ties from my room. So just to make sure, from what we've seen this ponytail shouldn't stay" Mom said gathering back your thick tresses. You watch her in the mirror and sure enough when Mom attempted to make the last knot the tie vanished and your hair tumbled back down to the floor.

"Soooo...now what?" you asked confused.

"We try something else. Thanks to your sister, I have a complete mental library of do's to choose from. Hmm... lets start with a French twist." Mom explained pulling back your hair again.

"Is that annoying at all, your infinite knowledge of.... being girly?" you ask.

"It was actually kind of fun. When I was in my closet I could easily tell what would go with what, what jewelry to wear, and now every type of hairdo in existence. Even ones I didn't know existed. All by just recollection. You know if were going to be stuck like this for a while-"

"What are you doing now" you quickly interrupted.

Your Mom pursed her lips. "I'm going to add this clip....and this bobby pin should hold everything together- *gasp*!". When mom added her bobby pin, your hair began twisting and styling itself on its own. In moments you were wearing a thick, perfectly made French twist. You ran your hands through your hair and gently patted the mass of hair tied back. Not one strand was out of place.

"When you did that hair morph at lunch. You mentioned something about never having to go to a salon" you theorized.

"I guess that means your hair always has to look perfect." Mom said in agreement. You pulled the clip and pin out allowing your hair to fall again. Sure enough it returned to its perfect wavy state. Giving it a go yourself, you pulled your hair up trying to replicate what mom did. You were not quite as successful, it looking more like jumbled mess. However, sure enough, when you put in the last pin your hair did its self it went back into the twist.

"Okay, so when you want to put your hair up... just do that." Mom managed. In the grand scheme of things it was the least strangest thing that happened all day.

"So..." you say changing the subject. "What am I going to do about this new school tomorrow?"

"You can skip again tomorrow. We should definitely learn more about the people we've become. But frankly we have to think long term. This may not be a terrible idea for you to... well learn more about your.... new state." Mom explained.

"But mom..." You started.

"Look regardless of how this happened... it happened. We're going to have to cope one way or another and its not like we have anyone else to talk to about this." Mom said bluntly.

You sat there in silence trying to process this information.

"Its not bad at all. Welcome to a whole other side of life." A breathy female voice said. You and Mom looked up and tall big breasted platinum blonde stood at the doorway of your closet.

"Oh my god. You look so beautiful sis." She said running over to you and giving you a hug. Her ass length hair covering you like a mask.

"Carly!?" you guessed.

"Don't recognize me, huh. I look so different, but so hot now." Carly said. She stood up and you got a better look at her. She was wearing a pair of cute high heeled booties and a red one shoulder dress. She had the same fully made up face, earrings, and perfect manicure as you two, though her nails where neon pink. Interestingly, while still large, her breasts where the smallest out of the three of you.

"Don't recognize your older sis?" Carly said mockingly. "Don't worry I won't rub it in too much."

You did your best to suppress your anger. "Carly" Mom intervened. "You didn't pick up my calls."

"Sorry, I was having too much fun. Being an adult is soooo much fun, and modeling is soooo cool too. Thanks for the mods by the way." Carly said, hefting her tits.

"We need to talk about that. I put that program on your phone as an emergency measure. Care to explain what you did?" Mom said.

"You guys don't know about the history function." Carly said distractedly.

"We know about it. We'd like to hear your explanation." Mom said seething.

"Maybe we ought to do this downstairs." You suggest.

121121111121122112222222.content:
You drive your red Mazda Miata through the city streets on your way to school, expertly changing lanes to avoid vehicles going slower than you. It's something you can practically do with your eyes closed -- and you almost have to, given how much your incredibly long hair whips around your face with the convertible top down.

Your mother apologized to you for about the ten-thousandth time as you ate the large plate of bacon and eggs that the family's personal chef prepared. Any doctor would be aghast at your eating habits, but since you won't gain weight or develop any health problems, your diet is nothing but things that taste good, and plenty of them.

You shift gears as you take a corner at high speed, your arm brushing against your giant breasts as it often does. As the program had said, the "species morph" functions your mother had done with the Morphing Program software were reversed, but not all the way, apparently to keep you within some range of "normal."

The drinking age is no longer 13, but the age of majority is now 16 -- drinking, smoking, voting, all legal at your age now (and you've turned 17).

Women's feet are no longer shaped to only wear high heels, but women still find them more comfortable than any other type of footwear.

The hair on all women's heads grows thick and lush and seems to grow a bit faster than it should, although it is cuttable; many women do choose to have it extremely long, but that's far from universal.

And while not all women have large breasts anymore, the average size does seem to be noticeably larger than it was before the Morphing Program, so your 34G's aren't necessarily outliers -- there are even a couple of girls at school who have a bigger pair than you do.

You peel into the student parking lot at your high school, scattering a couple of freshmen as you squeal the tires drifting into your reserved valedictorian parking space. Your mother never told you, during the day she had the program, that she'd drastically increased your intelligence. Schoolwork is a breeze to you now.

Most girls would check their makeup before walking into school, but you don't need to. You already know it looks perfect and slutty, as always, your mother's Morphing Program command that you always look your best outside the home still very much in effect. Your windblown hair magically styles itself as you get out of the car, but you know that even if someone's looking right at you, they won't notice anything has happened.

You look back to a billboard facing the parking lot that shows a naked woman reclining and drinking aa glass of milk with the slogan "Builds Beautiful Bodies." You can't believe this is happening. You always knew you were never Mom's favourite, but is she really this crazy?

You turn and look up at Mom's desk. She's left the remote sitting there. You consider making a grab for it or the computer, desperately hoping the part about this being permanent was a lie... but no, you wouldn't have time to try anything beyond mashing buttons, which would probably just make things worse. Besides, the desk and chair look huge now, and your body feels so weird. You don't fancy trying to climb up there.

Before you can comtemplate doing anything else, the door creaks open and in comes... not your mom, but your sister Carly. She grins wildy and lets out a little squeal as she lays eyes on you.

"Oh, you are just adorable!" she says happily as she skips over to you and kneels down to look you in the eye.

"Carly..." you begin, not sure what you're about to say to her. She cuts you off anyway by vigourously ruffling your hair - which is longer now, for some reason, and ends up getting in your face. Groaning, you try awkwardly to fix it with your little hands, but Carly gently does it for you, giving you a smile that would normally come off as warm and caring. As it stands, she's creeping you out.

"This is so great," she says. "This'll be so much better than having a brother."

"Carly, come on," you whine. "What did I ever do to you?"

"What did you ever do for me?" she counters, suddenly losing the smile. "You were always a waste of space as far as I'm concerned." Then the smile abruptly comes back. "But not anymore. We're going to have so much fun!"

Not only is it oh so girly, its diminuitive size drives home how small and young you are now. Meanwhile, Carly's smile just grows wider and more disturbing.

"Alright, honeybun, you don't need those boy clothes anymore," Mom says as she sets the pile on the floor beside you. "Let's get you looking nice."

Carly giggles and effortlessly pulls off your ill-fitting t-shirt. With a yelp, you instinctively look down at yourself and instantly regret it. You're a girl alright.

"Be a good girl and put your clothes on," Mom says.

"N-no way!" you stammer.

Carly laughs and grabs you by the sides, hoisting you out of your piled up old clothes and holding you in midair. "Waah!" you scream, dangling your legs ineffectually.

"Alright, I'll help you just this once," Mom chuckles. You try briefly to resist as she starts putting the clothes on you, but there's no point. Soon you're wearing the blue dress, white stockings and little black shoes.

"Beautiful!" Carly exclaims as she sets you down and grabs your head to make you look towards the mirror. The sight of your reflection causes you to whimper and bite your lip, making you look rather pathetic. It's a relief when Mom opens the door, putting the mirror out of sight.

"Alright, let's go, little sister!" Carly says. She suddenly takes your hand and dashes out of the room, bringing you stumbling behind her on your short legs. You manage to slip out of her grasp just as she passes by your bedroom.

As you stop and look at your door, an unpleasant thought occurs to you. Needing to see the extent of what's happened, you hesitantly push the door open to find that your room is... the same. Your games, your posters, your clothes, everything is still there. It's unmistakably the messy room of a teenage boy. You breathe a sigh of relief.

"C'mon, sis!" Carly beckons from her own doorway.

"You can't keep me like this!" you shout. "My friends will know I'm gone! You can't just replace me with a little girl... people will notice!"

"Oh, the program can take care of that, dearie," Mom says from behind you. "I just decided to leave that part until later. Of course, that means I haven't decided on the details of your new life yet, so... I suggest you behave yourself right now. If you're good, maybe I'll let you have some input."

You have just been granted a morphing program by an unknown company. You can use said program to morph just about anything. There's just one catch. The program is still in alpha testing, and all morphs done using the program are permanent. Please keep this in mind and happy writing.

Only major rule is please use half decent spelling and grammar

1. Body Morph
2. Mind Morph
3. Life Morph
4. Species Morph
5. Object Morph

Characters:
Mark: Average 16 year old, high school student
Carly: Annoying 12 year old sister, desperately wanted to be older sibling
Mary: 48 year old mom. Always wanted a another daughter in the family
John: 50 year old dad. Leaves on business trip at start of story.
